week3.practice2_html:
What it is

The Popeye Protocol helps you gently raise your iron intakeâ€”through food firstâ€”so your body has the building blocks to create strong hair at the root. It also teaches you how to stop everyday habits that quietly block iron absorption.

Kelly, youâ€™re in the stabilization phaseâ€”your shedding has slowed but new growth hasnâ€™t yet peaked. Because youâ€™ve had low iron in the past and recently restricted calories, boosting your iron stores is the single biggest lever now. Itâ€™s what helps your follicles shift from â€œpauseâ€ to â€œgrowthâ€ as your body exits its stress phase and edges toward midâ€‘2025 regrowth.

  1. Start your day with iron-friendly fuel: Include one ironâ€‘rich food at breakfastâ€”like oats with pumpkin seeds, eggs with spinach, or lentils blended into a smoothie.
  2. Pair iron with vitaminâ€¯C: Add berries, orange slices, or bell peppers to meals. A small squeeze of lemon over greens can double absorption.
  3. Mind your â€œiron blockersâ€: Keep coffee or tea at least one hour apart from main meals; caffeine after 3â€¯pm already tweaks your sleep, and separating it also protects absorption.

week3.practice3_html:
What it is

Why this practice matters for you now

Kelly, youâ€™re in the stabilization phase after a long stretch of worsening shedding. Think of it as feeding your follicles the building blocks theyâ€™ve been missing.

Step-by-step implementation

  1. Pick one daily source: Add 2â€“3 servings per week of salmon, sardines, or mackerel. If you donâ€™t like fish, use a spoonful of ground flaxseed or chia daily plus a clean algae oil capsule.
  2. Balance the rest of your fats: Swap butter or other heavy oils for olive or avocado oil when cooking.
  3. Check freshness: When using fish oil or seeds, make sure they smell neutralâ€”not fishy or sour. Rancid oils create the opposite effect on your scalp.
  4. Pair with protein: Enjoy your omegaâ€‘3 source in a meal containing at least 20â€“30â€¯g of protein for better absorption and stronger hair fiber support.
  5. Stay steady for 3â€¯weeks: Donâ€™t chase quick resultsâ€”just keep the habit consistent while your body rebuilds its nutrient reserves.

  • Watch-outs: Skipping fat altogether after 3â€¯p.m. (carryover diet habit) can keep hormones flatâ€”add a small portion of nuts or seeds with dinner to fix it.
